Sequence Information.Family: Belongs to the class IIb bacteriocin
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Comments: Acidocin J1132 is a pore-forming bacteriocin that creates cell membrane channels through the "barrel-stave" mechanism. Both alpha and beta had inhibitory activity, and an increase in activity by the complementary action of the two components was observed.

Literature.Title: Isolation, partial characterization, and mode of action of Acidocin J1132, a two-component bacteriocin produced by Lactobacillus acidophilus JCM 1132.
Literature.Author: Tahara T, Oshimura M, Umezawa C, Kanatani K.
